Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
BASIC_ARGSStore basic input arguments and option flags
GLQStore the nodes and weights needed for a GLQ integration
LOGGERKeep the information on the global logger
PRISMStore information on a rectangular prism
SPHEREStore information on a sphere
TESSEROIDStore information on a tesseroid
TESSG_ARGSStore input arguments and option flags for tessg* programs
TESSGRD_ARGSStore input arguments and option flags for tessgrd program
TESSMASS_ARGSStore input arguments and option flags for tessmass program
TESSMODGEN_ARGSStore input arguments and option flags for tessmodgen program
Generated on Tue Feb 15 17:31:18 2011 for Tesseroids 1.0: User manual and API documentation by  1.6.3
